awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: West Coast Number Theory Conference
awd_abstract_narration: This conference is the well-known "West Coast Number Theory                Conference", an annual event since 1967.  It will be held at the                University of Nevada at Las Vegas from December 16 to December                  21, 1988.  The format of the conference will be as in the past                  for these conferences - informal, designed for maximum exchange                 of ideas and results, and for making new mathematical contacts.                      The organizers of the conference are Professors Paul Aizley                and Peter Shiue of the Mathematics Department at the University                 of Nevada at Las Vegas.  Some participant support is available,                 with preference being given to younger number theorists and to                  graduate students.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
